name: v8.2.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc` (default with Bazel 7).
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "buildozer", version = "8.2.1")
```


## What's Changed
* Add explicit loads by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/29
* Update to buildozer 8.2.1 by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/30


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/compare/v8.2.0...v8.2.1



## What's Changed

* Update to 8.0.3 by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/27

name: v8.0.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc` (default with Bazel 7).
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "buildozer", version = "8.0.1")
```


## What's Changed
* Add missing quote to README by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/18
* Update buildozer to 7.3.1 and support s390x by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/19
* Update release action by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/21
* Test with 8.x in BCR presubmit by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/22
* Update buildozer to 8.0.0 by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/20
* Update to 8.0.1 by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/24
* Test on all latest minor versions by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/25
* Allow `buildozer` target to be aliased by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/23


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/compare/v7.1.2...v8.0.1

body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc` (default with Bazel 7).
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "buildozer", version = "6.4.0.2")
```

## What's Changed
* Add Bazel compatibility check to BCR presubmit by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/10

name: v6.4.0.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc` (default with Bazel 7).
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "buildozer", version = "6.4.0.1")
```


## What's Changed
* Allow write access for release workflow by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/5
* Fix BCR presubmit by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/6
* Make `buildozer_binary` extension platform-independent by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/8


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/compare/v6.4.0...v6.4.0.1

name: v6.4.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc` (default with Bazel 7).
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "buildozer", version = "6.4.0")
```


## What's Changed
* Update buildozer to 6.4.0 by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/1
* Implement "push tag to release" by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/2
* Update release instructions by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/3
* Test for no non-dev dependencies by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/4

## New Contributors
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/pull/1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/buildozer/commits/v6.4.0
